amendatorysection.bookinfo: Uniform Commercial Code, Reissue Revised Statutes of Nebraska
amendatorysection.catchline: Agreement on standards concerning rights and duties.
amendatorysection.para: (a) The parties may determine by agreement the standards measuring the fulfillment of the rights of a debtor or obligor and the duties of a secured party under a rule stated in section 9-602 if the standards are not manifestly unreasonable.
(b) Subsection (a) does not apply to the duty under section 9-609 to refrain from breaching the peace.
